title: Grade Calculator
prompt:
Create a grade calculator for 5 students with 3 test scores each:

1. Alice: 92, 88, 95
2. Bob: 78, 82, 75
3. Charlie: 65, 70, 68
4. Diana: 88, 92, 90
5. Eve: 55, 62, 58

For each student, calculate:
- Average score (using AVERAGE function)
- Letter grade using IF:
  - A: ≥ 90
  - B: ≥ 80
  - C: ≥ 70
  - D: ≥ 60
  - F: < 60

Use nested IF formulas for letter grades.

formulaRequirements.description: Uses AVERAGE function for calculating averages
Uses IF function for letter grades

formattingRequirements.description: Average scores should have number formatting (decimal places)

metadata.author: Benchmark System
metadata.notes: Tests nested IF statements and AVERAGE function
